revised_title: Identification of Ethylene Oxide as a Major Metabolite of Ethylene in Vicia faba L.
tldr: The authors discovered that ethylene oxide is a major metabolite of ethylene in Vicia faba L. They found that over 95% of applied ethylene was metabolized in less than 2 hours, with 85-95% of the radioactivity appearing in ethylene oxide. This study shows that the rapid metabolism of ethylene in plants is a tissue property and not due to microorganisms or wounding.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
